utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Can I see the comics?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is the New York Times.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, may I see the comics?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Guys. I thought you were taking Ross to the game?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We are. He's meeting us here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! Rachel is meeting us here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh come on, they can be in the same room.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, you shoulda been there last night.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why? What happened now?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well Ross was hangin' out over at our place, Rachel comes over to borrow some moisturiser from Chandler....

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah y-you, how hard is it to say something? Rachel came over to borrow something.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Anyway! Her and Ross just started yelling at each other.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wait. Why was he yelling at her? He's the one who slept with someone else.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I guess he says that because they were on a break when it happened, that she should of forgiven him by now.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Whoa!! He is soo unreasonable! God, although I think I understand what he means. Oh my God, this is like 60 Minutes, okay, when, when, at first you're really mad at that pharmaceutical company for making the drug and then y'know you just feel bad for the people because they needed to make their hair grow.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know what this is like? This is like when my parents got divorced. Man, I hope Ross doesn't try to kidnap me after Cub Scouts.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y'know I had a dream where Ross and Rachel were still together, they never broke up. And we were all just like hanging out, and everyone was happy....

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I had the same dream!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, and nobody slept with that Xerox girl.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I had the opposite dream.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know what maybe it's gonna be okay, I mean it's been a week.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I mean it's never taken me a week to get over a relationship.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's never taken you more than a shower to get over a relationship.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, let's go!! Let's hit the road!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Let's get the show on it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, let me just get a cup of coffee.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh Rachel, I know the best coffee house and it's sooo close.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Closer than here?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, hey, look, I found coffee! Okay, let's skedaddle.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait, I'm not just gonna drink somebody's old coffee.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, your highness.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Um, Rachel I'm really sorry. That's okay, do you wanna get back together? Yeah, okay. Did anyone else hear that?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Is he here?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. Here's your moisturiser. Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica and Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You guys are gonna love meee! Okay, check it out, Thursday night, five tickets, Calvin Klein lingerie show, and you guys are coming with me. Okay, I said that out loud right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, yes, it's just that we ah, we kinda all ready, made plans with Ross.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, well okay. Well, there you go.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, it's just that he got this new like home theater dealie, and he wants y'know, us to check it out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hm-mm.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, he's really excited about it too, he even recorded show times on his answering machine.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We're sorry honey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, it's okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Rach, it's, it's ah, it's not that we don't want to, really. Are we talking models in their underwear?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And heels.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross, did ask us first, and we set that night aside.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, hey, come on, if he asked you first, that's only fair.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohhh boy, do I feel bad.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Very bad.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Chandler what are you doing?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You're smoking again?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, actually, yesterday I was smoking again. Today, I'm, I'm smoking still.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why would you start again after chewing all that quitting gum?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, I'm telling you this is just like my parents divorce, which is when I started smoking in the first place.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Weren't you nine?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeahhh. I'm tellin' ya something, that ah, first smoke after nap time....

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh that's great, with my luck, that's gonna be him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Him? Him, Ross?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nope, hymn 253, His Eyes Are On The Sparrow! When my parents got divorced is when I started using humour as a defence mechanism.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Uhh, do you guys have plans for the weekend? Because I have my sister on hold, and she said that we could use her cabin for the weekend and go skiing. Huh? I'm asking you first, right?!. I mean I'm playing by the rules.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Absolutely, yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Chandler! You're smoking? What are you doing?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, shut up!! You're not my real Mom!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, can you close that window Chandler? My nipples can cut glass over here!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wait. Really?! 'Cause mine get me out of tickets.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, you guys I just wanna say, I really, really appreciate you spending this time with me. It's been a pretty hard time right now, so I just wanna say thanks.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Can somebody else hug him? I have to stay by the window.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh hey, hey, huh, how about this weekend we have a laser disc marathon okay, and maybe a tournament on my new dart board? Huh, huh, what do you think? Two days of darts, it'll be great!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It'll be great for next weekend.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, no, this weekend guys!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It'll be great for next weekend. I mean, it'll be grrreat.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, we were um, sorta invited to go skiing, y'know Rachel's sister's cabin.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, for the whole weekend?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We're really sorry, but um, she did ask us first.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, that's okay, I mean if you guys all have to go away for the first weekend I'm alone by myself, y'know then I totally, totally understand.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y'know what, I can stay, I'm gonna stay. 'Cause the last time I went skiing I was to afraid to jump off the chair lift, I just went around and around.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, Pheebs we kinda need you to drive us all up there in your grandmother's cab, but y'know what, I'll stay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Noo! I'll stay. He's my brother.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What a pity stay?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! We're gonna have fun. We can make fudge!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pity food? Y'know what that's okay, all right, I don't need any of you to stay, okay nobody stays.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, then, I might as well offer to stay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, does anybody else feel bad about Ross?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why? Do you think he's still mad at us?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well he's probably mad after you called him this morning to borrow his goggles.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What? Mine aren't tinted.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Chandler!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What does the sign say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Beam me up Jesus.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, the 'No Smoking' sign. There's no smoking in my Grandmother's cab.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, well, then, I-I have to go to the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Please!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No Chandler no! No unscheduled stops. You can go when we stop for gas.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, come on, there's a rest stop right up there! Come on, I really have to goooooooooo.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, now I have to go!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Here we go. Okay, brace yourselves.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ow!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Aren't you gonna go?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, Rachel never pees in public restrooms.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, they never have any paper in there y'know. So my rule is 'no tissue, no tuschy.' Well, if everybody's going.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, y'know what don't close it 'cause the... keys...are in there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, no-no-no-no-no-no!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: My lighter's in there!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Damn! The tailpipe's not hot enough to light this!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Relax okay, I-I-I can get this open. Anybody have a coat hanger?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh I do! Op, no, wait a minute, I took it out of my shirt when I put it on this morning.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, if you're parents hadn't got divorced, you'd be able to answer a question like a normal person?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, I just need a wire something to jimmy it. Oh hey, one of you guys give me the underwire from your bra!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on! Who has the biggest boobs?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Please!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoever has the biggest boobs, has the biggest bra, therefore has the biggest wire.

utterance.speaker: The Girls
utterance.content: No, not getting my bra!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: If you wanna get back in the car, we need the wire, your call.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, Monica's are the biggest.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: These tiny, little non-breasts?! Please, it's gotta be Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What, no, no, no, mine are deceptively small I mean, I-I-I actually sometimes, st-stuff my bra.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right then, your bra would still be big.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I stuff outside the bra.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ladies, ladies, let's just compromise okay? Phoebe, Rachel take off Monica's bra.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, forget it, nevermind, you can have mine.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Chandler, what are you doing? There is a trash can right there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I thought if I littered, that crying Indian might come by and save us.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, there.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thank you Phoebe, that is very, very generous.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, now let's decide who has the nicest ass.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And there you go!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oh, yeahhhhh!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: At least let me smoke it to the good part.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Oh, no!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What, what's it, what's going on?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, this has happened before.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So you know how to fix it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yep. Put more gas in.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Hey, what are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, oh just ah, I was just wondering, when you and I split up, did you get the tape that was half the last episode of M*A*S*H and half the hostages coming home?

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Ah yeah, but now it's Susan and me in Mexico and the hostages coming home.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Where's Ben?

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: He's sleeping.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ahh. Ooh, is this a ah, is this a bad time?

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Umm, yeah, actually, Susan's gonna be home any minute, it's kinda an anniversary.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh! I thought you guys got married in uh, January?

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: It's not that kind of anniversary.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ah! Oh.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Sooo!! Anyway...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm, candles, champagne, yeah anniversaries are great. 'Cause you know love lasts forever, y'know. Nothing like it in this lifetime, money in the bank, so Rachel and I broke up.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Oh God, Ross I am so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, well.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Y'know what, I want to talk to you about this so much, but we should probably do it when we could really get into it, are you free for dinner tomorrow night?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yeah, I'd love that.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Oh, great! Me too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I guess it all started when Rachel got this new job.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, yeah. Triple A can pick us up.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, what town are we near?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Freemont. West-Westmont, ah Westburg?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Then why are you answering? Do you at least know what route we're on?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, we are definitely on Route 27.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. We are at a rest stop on Route 27. Okay. There is no Route 27. Okay, either 93 or 76?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't know, I'm sorry, I always slept in the back when we drove up here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Hey, can you send somebody up and down 76 and check every rest stop, and, and also 93? Okay! Yeah, no they don't do that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh, okay, well somebody will come and save us.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who? I mean have you seen a car come by here in the last hour and a half? I think we should call Ross, maybe he can get a car and come pick us up.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! No, I am not getting in a car with Ross, we will just have to live here!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But if...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No you guys, I am not getting in a car with him, you'll have to think of something else.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh good, oh Joey and Chandler are back.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So the going for help went well?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah, Smokey Joe here got half way to the highway and collapsed.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I have the lung capacity of a two year old.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Then why are you smoking?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well it's very unsettling.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ....right? Right? I mean it's pretty unbelievable y'know, I mean they just took off, took off without even looking back. Y'know I don't, I don't need them, huh, I've got you guys now as friends, you and Susan.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Ah, Susan will be so pleased.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: 717? Where's 717? Hey, you've have more of these for Susan right?

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: No. But it's okay, I'll just put out pickles or something.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ross, thank God.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pheebs? What, why are you whispering?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I ate a bug.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Rach, the tampons here are only a penny. Let's stock up.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Listen Ross, we ran out of gas, and we don't know where we are, so we can't get a tow truck.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, now you want a favour?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes, please.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, oh, I'm sorry your car broke down Pheebs, but I'm a little too busy with some of my real friends right now, but please call to let me know you got home safely okay?

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Phoebe, hang on a second. Here, take my car, go pick up your friends.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I'm not gonna pick them up.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Listen, we both know you're gonna do it 'cause you're not a jerk. Okay? So you can either sulk here for a half hour and then go pick them up, or save us both time and sulk in the car.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, Rachel doesn't want me to....

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Look, I-I-I am sorry that Rachel dumped you 'cause she fell in love with that Mark guy, and you are the innocent victim in all of this, but don't punish your friends for what Rachel did to you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, you're right.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Phoebe hang on a second Ross wants to say something. What? You slept with someone else?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We were on a break!!! Okay!! We were, we were..., yeah. Where are you? I'll find you.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: You slept with another woman?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, you-you're-you're one to talk.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, done.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What's 'pleh'?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's 'help' spelled backwards so that the helicopters can read it from the air!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Huh. What's doofus spelled backwards?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Op, op, car! Car!! Ugh!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, it's Ross on one of his drives!

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Joey
utterance.content: Hey!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What is he doing here?!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: No! Come on!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right!! Fine! Fine.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Arrrghh!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh no, now it's not gonna make any sense!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You guys, what, what do we do about Ross who drove all the way up here? What do we do? Just like send him back and we're then gonna go skiing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, this is horrible, it's just horrible.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Guys, do you think we should ask Ross to come along?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know, what about Rachel? I mean how are we even gonna ask her?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ask me what?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Umm, if ah, it might be okay if Ross came skiing?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You guys are unbelievable. No! He cannot come.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's horrible.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh please, can't I come to your special, magical cabin?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why would you even want to come Ross? You're a horrible skier.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh-oh, hitting me where it hurts, my ski skills.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Here we go again.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I-I can't handle this, you guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know what, I can handle it, handle's my middle name. Actually it's the ah, middle part of my first name.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right Pheebs, your cab's ready.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, let's go!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're welcome.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry, were you speaking to me or sleeping with someone else?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We were on a break!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y'know Ross why don't you put that on your answering machine!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey-hey, it's valid okay? And I'm not the only one who thinks so, Monica agrees with me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's what you said last night.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What I said was, was that I understood. Joey's the one who agreed with you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really Joey?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y'know what, but there is, there is no right or wrong, here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I think it's very obvious who's wrong here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Obviously not to Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look both, Joey and Monica feel the same way that I do. No-no-no-no.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Guys, guys, guess who I am?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!! Hey!!! Look what you're doing to Chandler!! Yeah, look, we know this is really, really hard for you guys. Okay? You don't, all right you don't have to love each other, okay? You don't, you don't even have to like each other much right now. But please, you have to figure out a way to be around each other.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, and not put us in the middle.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, otherwise, I mean that's, that's, that's just it for us hanging out together. Y'know is that what you want? Can you be civil?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Good, all right, let's get back in the car, 'cause it's freezing, and my chest is unsupported.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh what, wait, wait a second, I mean, what are we doing? Who's going with who?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, you guys, you guys should go. No, I'm, you, you planned this all out, and I don't want to ruin it, so you guys should just go.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on man, you drove all the way up here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, really, I've got to take the car back anyway, I'm spending all day tomorrow with Ben, It's fine, no guilt I promise.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, we'll call you when we get back.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Maybe we can like go to a movie or something.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Or, or the rodeo!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That would be great.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I was being Shelly Winters from The Poseidon Adventure.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Bye!!!

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Ugh. Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi! Sorry I'm late. Were you sleeping?

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Ahh, nooo!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, great! Listen, oh I had to get you a whole new battery. I got you the best one I could, 'cause that's not where you want to skimp.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: You're a genius, Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, well it came to about $112, but what the hell, just call it an even 110?

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Okay, I'll pay you tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Okay, bye!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So they ah, they all took off, it was pretty hard watching them go, y'know?

utterance.speaker: Carol
utterance.content: Yeah, okay, bye.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So I'm gonna take off then!
